gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ,
with or without
COMPLEMENT

sense.def:
To be christened
pomeni, da dojenčku pri krstu določijo krstno ime.

seg.quote: Charles II was christened in this church.

sense.def:
To christen a place or an object
pomeni izbrati in začeti uporabljati ime za neki kraj ali predmet;

seg.quote: The crew christened the hot geysers the ‘black smokers’.
